name: backheel
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in football, a pass made using the heel (= the rounded back part of the foot): His backheel to Pessotto took two defenders completely out of the game.

to pass a football using the back of your heel (= the rounded back part of your foot): He managed to backheel the ball into his own net.
